attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Steve Gibson, the saviour of Middlesbrough football club, has done more for the people of Middlesbrough than any politician in the ever has. We recognise his contribution to our area and would like to see him rewarded for this.

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.honours.gov.uk/
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
